Chapter 1117 is titled "A".

Cover Page[]

Oni Child Yamato's Golden Harvest Surrogate Pilgrimage, Vol. 7: "I'll pay my respects to the code of the yakuza before I go!!"

Short Summary[]

As people throughout the world react to the information about how the sea level had risen 200 meters centuries ago at Marine GS General Hospital, the members of SWORD recover from their recent trip. At Egghead, Nusjuro attacks the Thousand Sunny, but Zoro with Jinbe's help intercepts him and tells Nami's group to sail off at once as they will jump on. Elsewhere, the Giant Warrior Pirates begin their own withdrawal as the Marines continue their assault. Just as Dr. Vegapunk is about to state the final part of his message regarding the Will of D., Warcury attacks the Iron Giant, causing the message to end.

Long Summary[]

The pirates on Hachinosu began thinking that there is treasure on the sea floor of the entire world, but some point out that not all of the cities of the past were like Shandora, and the ocean floor is 200 meters below sea level, so getting there is almost impossible, at least without a ship that can dive below that level. Elsewhere, Mont Blanc Cricket, who was listening to Dr. Vegapunk's message, decides to go diving again to see if there is treasure beneath the waters from the old world.

At the Marines' GS hospital, the members of SWORD are recovering from their battle at Hachinosu and listening to Dr. Vegapunk's message. X Drake has returned and is recovering as well, but he wants to be alone, and Smoker contacts Tashigi, asking where she is right now; she tells him she is at the GS hospital. Dr. Vegapunk says that if he says anything more, then it would be just speculation rather than concrete fact, but several people want to know what Roger left behind.

On Egghead, the Straw Hats see the Frontier Dome's barrier lowering and the clouds have stopped stretching, but Usopp says they have more than enough distance to reach the water. Brook reports that the cola barrels are all loaded, so they can use Coup de Burst whenever they want. Nami contacts Jinbe and asks if he is almost at the ship, and he reports he is, but he is also chasing Nusjuro. Nami at first thinks he is taking a detour, but Jinbe corrects her saying Nusjuro is heading straight for the ship.

As Nusjuro is about to attack the ship, Jinbe uses Kata Guruma to throw Zoro at Nusjuro, where he then uses Two-Sword Style: Restful Paradise Rashomon to intercept Nusjuro. While their blades clash, both recognize the opposing Kitetsu before the two repel each other. Zoro tells the others to take off and that the two of them will jump on. Down on the northeast coast of the island, Bonney is calling for Luffy while the Marines have surrounded the Giants' ship. Luffy yells very loudly that he is almost there and for them to get the ship moving. They start doing so and mow down the ships in their way, but Bluegrass uses one of the Sea Beast Weapons she is riding to blow a hole through the ship, before Doll knocks out Kashii with a move called Rock 'n' Roll Blaster, the assault strengthening the morale of the Marines.

Luffy, who is back to normal again, notices that Warcury has stopped chasing the three of them, which the giants are relieved to hear. It turns out he did so to meet up with Saturn, Mars, and Ju Peter to engage the Iron Giant. As they do, Dr. Vegapunk announces he has one more thing to say as the Elders recognize the robot as the same one that attacked Mary Geoise 200 years ago. Dr. Vegapunk addresses several people who have the name "D.", but before he can say something to them, Warcury tackles the Iron Giant, knocking it down while at the same time jamming the signal and ending the broadcast. York falls to her knees, relieved that the message has finally stopped.

Quick References[]

Chapter Notes[]

  • Krieg, Pearl and Gin, seen for the first time since the Baratie Arc, are at Hachinosu.
  • SWORD's members, including Tashigi, are recovering in Marine GS General Hospital.
    • Drake is still alive after the events of the Raid on Onigashima.
  • Smoker is at sea, towing an unknown container behind his Billower Bike.
  • Nusjuro attempts to slice the Thousand Sunny, but is intercepted by Zoro and Jinbe.
    • Both Zoro and Nusjuro note they each possess a Kitetsu blade.
    • Zoro tells Nami's group to escape ahead of him and Jinbe.
    • Nusjuro's sword is missing the tsuba handguard.
  • Dorry and Brogy order their crew to set sail amidst a Marine blockade.
    • Doll defeats Kashii while Bluegrass attacks the ship with a Sea Beast Weapon.
  • The Five Elders sans Nusjuro surround the Iron Giant.
    • Vegapunk had an important message for everyone with the initial D in their name, but was left unheard.
    • Warcury attacks the Giant, causing Vegapunk's transmission to be interrupted before the last part could be played.

Author Comment[]


Author Comment
  • Translation
  • Original


The Sekai no Owari concert was an amazing performance once again! They create such a warm atmosphere! I had so much fun!


セカオワライブ相変わらず凄いセット!!演出!!暖かい空間作り!!楽しかったです!

—Eiichiro Oda
English translation by VIZ Media. For comprehensive translation credits, see here.

Trivia[]

  • Nusjuro's sword was missing the tsuba when he attacked the Thousand Sunny and clashing with Zoro.

'''Chapter 1117''' is titled "A". 

==Cover Page==
[[Oni Child Yamato's Golden Harvest Surrogate Pilgrimage]], Vol. 7: "I'll pay my respects to the code of the yakuza before I go!!"

==Short Summary==
As people throughout the world react to the information about how the sea level had risen 200 meters centuries ago at [[Marine GS General Hospital]], the members of [[SWORD]] recover from their recent [[Hachinosu|trip]]. At [[Egghead]], [[Ethanbaron V. Nusjuro|Nusjuro]] attacks the [[Thousand Sunny]], but [[Roronoa Zoro|Zoro]] with [[Jinbe]]'s help intercepts him and tells [[Nami]]'s group to sail off at once as they will jump on. Elsewhere, the [[Giant Warrior Pirates]] begin their own withdrawal as the [[Marines]] continue their assault. Just as [[Vegapunk|Dr. Vegapunk]] is about to state the final part of his message regarding the [[Will of D.]], [[Topman Warcury|Warcury]] attacks the [[Emet|Iron Giant]], causing the message to end.

==Long Summary==
The [[pirate]]s on [[Hachinosu]] began thinking that there is treasure on the [[Sea Floor|sea floor]] of the entire [[world]], but some point out that not all of the cities of the past were like [[Shandora]], and the ocean floor is 200 meters below sea level, so getting there is almost impossible, at least without a ship that can dive below that level. Elsewhere, [[Mont Blanc Cricket]], who was listening to [[Vegapunk|Dr. Vegapunk's]] message, decides to go diving again to see if there is treasure beneath the waters from the old world.

At the [[Marines]]' [[Marine GS General Hospital|GS hospital]], the members of [[SWORD]] are recovering from their battle at Hachinosu and listening to Dr. Vegapunk's message. [[X Drake]] has returned and is recovering as well, but he wants to be alone, and [[Smoker]] contacts [[Tashigi]], asking where she is right now; she tells him she is at the GS hospital. Dr. Vegapunk says that if he says anything more, then it would be just speculation rather than concrete fact, but several people want to know what [[Gol D. Roger|Roger]] left behind.

On [[Egghead]], the [[Straw Hat Pirates|Straw Hats]] see the Frontier Dome's barrier lowering and the clouds have stopped stretching, but [[Usopp]] says they have more than enough distance to reach the water. [[Brook]] reports that the cola barrels are all loaded, so they can use Coup de Burst whenever they want. [[Nami]] contacts [[Jinbe]] and asks if he is almost at the ship, and he reports he is, but he is also chasing [[Ethanbaron V. Nusjuro|Nusjuro]]. Nami at first thinks he is taking a detour, but Jinbe corrects her saying Nusjuro is heading straight for the [[Thousand Sunny|ship]].

As Nusjuro is about to attack the ship, Jinbe uses ''Kata Guruma'' to throw [[Roronoa Zoro|Zoro]] at Nusjuro, where he then uses ''Two-Sword Style: Restful Paradise Rashomon'' to intercept Nusjuro. While their blades clash, both recognize the opposing [[Kitetsu]] before the two repel each other. Zoro tells the others to take off and that the two of them will jump on. Down on the northeast coast of the island, [[Jewelry Bonney|Bonney]] is calling for Luffy while the Marines have surrounded the Giants' ship. Luffy yells very loudly that he is almost there and for them to get the ship moving. They start doing so and mow down the ships in their way, but Bluegrass uses one of the [[Sea Beast Weapons]] she is [[Nori Nori no Mi|riding]] to blow a hole through the ship, before [[Doll]] knocks out [[Kashii]] with a move called ''Rock 'n' Roll Blaster'', the assault strengthening the morale of the Marines.

Luffy, who is back to normal again, notices that [[Topman Warcury|Warcury]] has stopped chasing the three of them, which the giants are relieved to hear. It turns out he did so to meet up with [[Jaygarcia Saturn|Saturn]], [[Marcus Mars|Mars]], and [[Shepherd Ju Peter|Ju Peter]] to engage the [[Emet|Iron Giant]]. As they do, Dr. Vegapunk announces he has one more thing to say as the [[Five Elders|Elders]] recognize the robot as the same one that attacked [[Mary Geoise]] 200 years ago. Dr. Vegapunk addresses several people who have the name "[[Will of D.|D.]]", but before he can say something to them, Warcury tackles the Iron Giant, knocking it down while at the same time jamming the signal and ending the broadcast. [[Vegapunk/York|York]] falls to her knees, relieved that the message has finally stopped.

===Chapter Notes===
*[[Krieg]], [[Pearl]] and [[Gin]], seen for the first time since the [[Baratie Arc]], are at [[Hachinosu]].
*[[SWORD]]'s members, including [[Tashigi]], are recovering in [[Marine GS General Hospital]].

**Vegapunk had an important message for everyone with the initial [[Will of D.|D]] in their name, but was left unheard.
